20101221190714.000|20101221190716.000|CC1|37 TRAPPED HORSES EARLY

20101221190719.000|20101221190721.000|CC1|STABLES IN NORCO.

20101221190723.000|20101221190726.000|CC1|CHESTS FROM THE SANTA ANA

20101221190732.000|20101221190732.000|CC1|GROUND.

20101221190737.000|20101221190739.000|CC1|ONE PULLED OUT ON IT'S OWN      
20101221190739.000|20101221190741.000|CC1|BUT THEN POSSIBLY DIED.         
20101221190741.000|20101221190743.000|CC1|>> CREWS ARE OUT IN THE RAIN    
20101221190743.000|20101221190746.000|CC1|TRYING TO FIX POWER OUTAGES
